author: Balázs Puskás
comment: Notification isn't working, therefore i can't use my smartwatch for geocaching. I wrote an email for the developer, no answer yet. Otherwise it's a good app, easier to use than cgeo.

author: Pattie Lynn
comment: I HATE IT

author: Neil Gavigan
comment: Use together with c:geo to get all hints and info without the 24 hour restriction .all logs are logged in the official geocacheing app

author: Kitty Vlogs
comment: Imposter of geocashing..... It's not the real one:/
This one is the worst of the worst.  Don't even bother trying it. Nuisance.
title: Worst

author: A STUPID CHAIR
comment: It told the truth 🙌👌👌👍 best app ever
title: This app called me a loser

author: slc
comment: I really like this app of any else I've tried, or my friends have.  The best part being the direction arrow and map are on the same page.  The only reason i didn't give it 5 starts is because i can't get the hints to work, or see photos if others have logged them in on the activity page. I can do these things on the other apps I've used so i kept one just for those reasons. But still prefer to navigate with this app. Do i need to do something to get hints?

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content: Hints should show up as a short popup on the bottom of the screen. More features coming soon!

title: Househag

author: MusicalReverence3
comment: Paid $4 to access more on the app but there are still annoying ads AND you can only access 3 caches in a 24 hour period. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content:
Please restart the app, there should be no ads after payment.
This limit of 3 caches a day is not from this app but from geocaching.com itself. They don't allow users without Premium account to open more caches.

title: Stupid

author: Janis Russell
comment: Why can I only open three a day if I just paid $4 ?  What a rip . Also why is the arrow on the top right not working now ?  Please help . This is so frustrating

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content:
This limit of 3 caches a day is not from this app but from geocaching.com itself. They don't allow users without Premium account to open more caches.
The arrow should work just fine to open a cache in another app. Please send a description of your error to support@fluer-apps.com for further help.

title: Geoc aching app and widget

author: Annemarie Reilly
comment: Only showed 3 geocaches for the whole west of Ireland.

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content: You can do a search to find more caches. If you want to see more than 3 caches at a time, please upgrade to the Pro Version.

author: TheEgger
comment: Paid for pro. Best decision I ever made.

comment: Sgcgchucuc7gf7t
title: Love it

author: Joey Crumby
comment: Stopped working after about 3 hours. Won't load. Rip off. Want my money back.

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content:
Could you please send a short message to support@fluer-apps.com. What exactly is not working? Did the update help?

If you want your money back, please send your order number to support@fluer-apps.com

title: Quit working the first day.

title: Love it

comment: It doesn't load. The geo free app works way better

comment: No problems getting this to work. My only complaint would be that's it not possible to change its appearance and as it is its not as good to look at as it could be.
title: Works for me

author: Justin Babb
comment: Doesn't even show all avaiable

author: Mason Morris
comment: Perhaps I'm missing something? It doesn't add any widgets to my phone.

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content: You have either to long touch the homescreen or go to your apps menu depending on your android version. There you will find the widget to place it on your homescreen. Check out https://www.yahoo.com/tech/how-to-add-android-widgets-to-your-phones-home-screen-85049692289.html

author: Juan Rojas
comment: Tells me to install widget in home screen, widget is nowhere to be found under the widget section of my phone.

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content: Please check the Widget Section of your phone

title: Huawei Vitria won't find widget

author: Steven Adkins
comment: Even after reading to clear browser,  can't log on.  Will  change review if I can ever log on and use it.
title: Still not able to log in

author: jim cotterill
comment: Shows all the closest caches. Works alot better than expected.
title: Great

author: George Kirkwood
comment: Only shows 1 cache. Constantly nags you to upgrade. Simple amateurish interface. No Android Wear support no matter what dev says - it just displays geocache overview.  Avoid at all costs.
title: Absolute rubbish

author: Dennise Carter
comment: Hardly showed any caches saying I needed to upgrade. Well I upgraded and it hasn't worked since I paid for the upgrade.
title: Don't waste your time or money.

author: John Michaels
comment: Please, don't add notifications and then claim your app supports the Android Wear platform because of it. Unless I can either access the app directly from my watch or perform additional actions from the notifications it generates (for example...navigating to the cache on the watch) just stop. It's misleading and a waste of time for users looking for a Geocaching companion for their Wear device.
title: Doesn't actually have "Wear" support

author: Kandace Hayes
comment: Think it could be better if it had everything included.
title: I like the pro version, but..

author: S Kang
comment: No locations and ads pop up instantly
title: No locations and ads pop up instantly

author: Aaron Lucas
comment: I down loaded this app and even paid for the pro version and cannot view any caches. So basically I downloaded an app that I have for free already that was pre-installed on my cell (maps). I want my money back!

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content: please send you exact problem and your order number to support@matthias-fluer.at to solve this case

title: Where's the cache?

author: Sophie Webber
comment: Literally the most useless geocaching app I have ever used.

author: Dyllan Usher
comment: Very handy

author: Darla S
comment: I have the app on my home screen now on my newer phone. It just shows a map. No caches and I know we have a bunch in town. I hope the next update makes this work. I paid ten bucks last summer for this.

reply.author: fluer-apps.com
reply.content: Please put the widget on your homescreen to see caches. If there are any more problems contact support@matthias-fluer.at

reply.content: You have to put the widget on your homescreen to see the caches!
